name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit 2
description:
This installs Need for Speed: hot Pursuit 2 as it can be found as abandon-ware here: https://www.myabandonware.com/game/need-for-speed-hot-pursuit-2-dna

The CD-Key (8249-7EE3-84EW-TXGT) is listed on this site.

files.patch: N/A: Select the Patch Setup File

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/EA Games/Need For Speed Hot Pursuit 2/nfshp2.exe

content:
files:
- patch: 'N/A: Select the Patch Setup File'
- nocd: 'N/A: Select the Patch File (nfshp2.exe)'
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/EA Games/Need For Speed Hot Pursuit 2/nfshp2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: AutoRun.exe
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: nocd
